word_mean: 脉络膜：从视网膜锯齿缘延伸到视神经的有色素沉着的血管薄膜
它对视网膜供血，并将动脉及神经引入前方结构

sentence.Network_en: The choroid coat carries many blood vessels to supply the retina.
sentence.Network_cn: 脉络膜通过许多血管为视网膜供应血液.

sentence.Network_en: The ciliary body is an anterior dilation of the choroid at the level of the lens.
sentence.Network_cn: 晶状体是脉络膜石晶状体平面上向前扩大的部分.

sentence.Network_en: The choroid plexus is composed of loose connective tissue of the pia mater.
sentence.Network_cn: 脉络丝由软脑膜的疏松结缔组织构成.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 生物医学工程专业英语课件 - 豆丁网 ... sclera 巩膜 choroid 脉络膜 retina 视网膜.
chorioretinitis 脉络膜视网膜炎choroid 脉络膜的choroid coat 脉络膜
Successful therapy of choroid plexus carcinoma ., 成功治疗脉络丛癌.
医学英语 ... Chorionic villi 绒毛膜绒毛 Choroid 脉胳膜 Chromatid 染色单体.

list.abs: 经平均两年的观察术后视力皆维持稳定，并无自发性脉络膜渗出(Choroidal effusion)的发生。术后眼压得以维持稳定，无须另以辅助药 …
...分化出虹膜的平滑肌，即瞳孔括约肌和瞳孔开大肌。 　胚胎第5周，视杯及视柄下方向内凹陷，形成一条纵沟，称脉络膜裂（choroid fissure）。脉络膜裂内含间充质和玻璃体动、静脉，为玻璃体和晶状体的发育提供营养。玻璃体动脉还发出分支营养视网膜.
choroid coat 脉络膜choroid plexus 脉络膜丛choroiditis 脉络膜炎
... 脉络膜脱离 choroidal detachment 脉络膜新生血管 choroidal neovascularization 脉络宁注射液 Mailuoning Injection.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Greek khoroeidēs (adjective), alteration of khorioeidēs, from khorion (see chorion)

means.word_mean: 1. a highly vascular membrane in the eye between the retina and the sclera

auth_sentence.content: The RPE itself is nourished by the underlying dense vascular network called the choroid.
auth_sentence.res_content: The RPE itself is nourished by the underlying dense vascular network called the choroid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The RPE itself is nourished by the underlying dense vascular network called the choroid.

auth_sentence.content: The layer farthest from the incoming light is a rich network of blood vessels known as the choroid.
auth_sentence.res_content: The layer farthest from the incoming light is a rich network of blood vessels known as the choroid.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The layer farthest from the incoming light is a rich network of blood vessels known as the choroid.
